## Validators.minDatetime() method

Creates validator function that validates control if its value is withing range of minimal datetime value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static minDatetime<TDate = any>(datetime: DateTimeValueObject<TDate>, dateApi: DateApi<TDate>): ValidatorFn;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  datetime | [DateTimeValueObject](./datetime.datetimevalueobject.md)<!-- -->&lt;TDate&gt; | Object storing information about datetime value |
|  dateApi | [DateApi](./datetime.dateapi.md)<!-- -->&lt;TDate&gt; | Date api object |

<b>Returns:</b>

ValidatorFn
